item.description:
Event to be held at AutumnColor Digital Imaging. Donna's place of employment. We've been talking about having a meetup here and it's finally come to pass.

Don't forget to bring any new images to let us look at and discuss (this means you Michael N.) and feel free to bring any refreshments you like.

See you there.


Scott.

Sorry we didn't get this up sooner, but we just got the OK from Donna's Boss. Sorry to Shane and any any other's (I know who you are) about the late posting.

See you there.

Oh, Park on the side of the Building and enter through the far door on the street side. It has a burgundy awning. We'll post signs too.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography February Meetup
